Package test.java.com.warzone.services.impl

Class MapEditorServiceImplTest

java.lang.Object
test.java.com.warzone.services.impl.MapEditorServiceImplTest
public class MapEditorServiceImplTest extends Object
JUnit test cases for the scene editor class. Test case to verify the correct insertion and removal of continent. Test case to verify the correct insertion and removal of country. Test case to verify the correct creation and deletion of neighbors. Test case to verify the show map command. Test case to verify the correct behavior of edit map and save map commands .
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Niloufar Pilgush, Nasrin Maarefi, Jerome Kithinji, Ali sayed Salehi, Fatemeh Chaji
